alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Dougherty; Lee; Randolph; Terrell; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 1:21PM EDT until May 06 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dougherty County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Turner County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Randolph County in southwestern Georgia... Lee County in southwestern Georgia... Calhoun County in southwestern Georgia... Terrell County in southwestern Georgia... Northwestern Worth County in south central Georgia... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 121 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Shellman to near Leary, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morgan, Albany, Ashburn, Dawson, Leesburg, Shellman, Leary, Smithville, East Albany, Marine Corps Logistics Base, Turner City, Walker, Worth, Sycamore, Warwick, Sasser, Bronwood, Stocks, Radium Springs and Dawson Municipal A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Dougherty; Lee; Randolph; Terrell; Turner; Worth
